events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like a refund as soon as possible because this is very disappointing.
The issue is identified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
The case has been assigned to customer service representative Emma L. for further assistance.
Hello! I'm Emma, and I'm here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund efficiently, may I also ask you to send a photo of the item you received?
Thank you, Emma. My order number is 123456789, and I have attached photos showing the incorrect item I got.
We apologize for the mix-up. We will initiate a full refund immediately and send a prepaid return label for the wrong item.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the return label soon.
Your refund has been processed, and the return shipping label has been emailed to you. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and that everything was resolved to your satisfaction.
Since we have not heard back and your refund was completed, we will now close this case. Thank you for contacting support!
